prompts: Create a legendary electric-type Pokemon that resembles a powerful feline with unique lightning patterns.
I want to see an impressive Pokemon that combines agility and speed, showcasing vibrant yellow and blue colors.
Generate an image of a majestic Pokemon with fur that sparkles, surrounded by electric energy and a fierce expression.
Make a design for a mythical creature that embodies the essence of storms, with striking features and a commanding presence.
Imagine a Pokemon that strikes fear in its opponents with its electrifying aura and strikingly bold colors.
Show me a Pokemon with a blend of fierce and noble traits, highlighted by its striking color palette and sleek body.
Design a powerful creature that stands out with its unique combination of colors and electrifying abilities.

distinctive_features: Distinctive blue markings on the face
Long, flowing tail with an electric spark

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and powerful strikes with electric attacks
